Producer: Tove Christensen, Sarik Andreasyan, Gevond Andreasyan, Georgy Malkov, Vladimir Polyakov
Rating: R (Pervasive Language|Brief Drug Use|Some Sexual Material|Strong Violence)
Synopsis: Within 24 hours of being released from a 10-year sentence, Frankie (Adrien Brody) threatens to drag his brother James (Hayden Christensen) back into the criminal underworld that nearly swallowed them both years before.
Title: American Heist
